rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a foyer and coat closet.
Spacious open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen for social gatherings. Features Mediterranean decor elements like exposed brick accents and terracotta tiles.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen with open-plan design connected to the living area. Equipped with stainless steel finishes and rustic wooden accents.
Cozy dining space adjacent to the living area, ideal for intimate family meals.
Functional bathroom designed with modern fixtures and efficient layout; includes a shower and sink.
Compact storage space for household items.

openings.description: Main entrance door with arches reflecting Mediterranean style and Vastu alignment, ensuring a welcoming energy flow.
Large window facilitating natural light and ventilation. Placed according to Vastu principles for prosperity and positive energy.
Sliding glass door connecting the kitchen and living area with access to a small outdoor terrace or garden, promoting open space.
Side entrance for easy access from adjacent garden or pool area.

additional_features.description: A private Mediterranean-style swimming pool designed for relaxation and entertainment. Placed according to Vastu principles with emphasis on the direction of water elements.
